page.title: 07SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content: THE PEOPLE WHO WERE SURVEYED WERE ALMOST UNANIMOUS IN THE WISH THAT {PROVISION}COULD BE MADE FOR THE{YOUNG {PEOPLE}IN THE AREA.{SPORTS FACILITIES BEING A{MAJOR OBJECTIVE.}BEING A RURAL AREA,THERE HAS BEEN A{RUNNING DOWN}OF {BUS SERVICES.}SO MUCH THAT THE SERVICE IS SO INFREQUENT THAT IT IS ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE TO LIVE IN THE OUTLYING AREAS WITHOUT PRIVATE TRANSPORT. A DESIRE WAS EXPRESSED THAT A{BETTER BUS SERVICE SHOULD BE MADE AVAILABLE. THE AREA IS ON THE FLIGHT PATH OF{HIGH {SPEED LOW FLYING TRAINING AIRCRAFT}AND THESE CAUSE A{GOOD DEAL OF {DISTURBANCE.}IT WAS FELT THAT THE QUALITY OF LIFE WOULD BE IMPROVED IF FLIGHTS WERE STOPPED. THIRDLY, SOME PEOPLE WISHED TO SEE{MORE HOUSING, {PARTICULARLY STARTER HOMES}FOR THE YOUNG LOCAL{PEOPLE}WHO HAVE BE{PRICED {OUT OF OWNER OCCUPATION}RECENTLY.
